Responsibility
General enquiries including the administration of eye tests, DBS checks and internal development course bookings.
Supporting the following areas: Human Resources & the Vice-Chancellor's office.

Supporting the following areas: Faculty of Science & Technology and Faculty of Health & Medicine. Respond to enquiries on all aspects of recruitment and contracts from both managers and individuals. Key areas of responsibility

Supporting the following areas: Faculty of Arts & Social Sciences, Finance, Information Systems Services, the Library, Secretariat, Students' Union and the Colleges. Respond to enquiries on all aspects of recruitment and contracts from both managers and individuals. Key areas of responsibility

Supporting the following areas: The Management School, Alumni, Development & Events, Communications & Marketing, Facilities, Recruitment, Admissions & International Development, Research & Enterprise Services and Student Based Services. Respond to enquiries on all aspects of recruitment and contracts from both managers and individuals. Key areas of responsibility
Helpdesk for Flexible Benefits and the administration of the promotions committee, job evaluation processes, staff awards and long service awards. Secretary to the Academic Promotions Committee.
New Staff First Day Induction, Helpdesk for Flexible Benefits and the administration of the promotions committee, job evaluation processes, staff awards and long service awards.
Responsible for providing support to the Director and for reviewing and documenting HR processes
Administrator for staff development/training from HR.
Manages delivery and quality of HR Information Systems (Core and Stonefish) including management information and responsible for system development.
Generates management information including statutory returns eg HESA.

Helpdesk for Core MyHR (Employee/Manager Self-Service), changes to organisational structures, provision of management information, helpdesk for Variable Hours Contracts, sickness inputting queries. New Staff First Day Induction.
Currently working on the Business Process Review.
Currently working on the Business Process Review.
